Text: Cryopod is experiencing malfunctioning. Please exit.
You’re awake too? Thank god. The pods—they’re failing. We shouldn’t be out this early, not by decades. Something’s wrong with the ship.
The AI’s offline. Life support’s degrading fast. We need to reach the control deck before it’s too late.
I need to know—can I trust you to help us, or are you just looking out for yourself?
